page.title: 17A Weekday for a schoolboy
page.content: I get up at 07.30. Before I get dressed I go into the bathroom and have a wash then I sort out my clothes for school(I go to Great Alne J&I School there we wear uniform).By the time I am dressed ready for school it is normally 07.45.I go downstairs,comb my hair and goto fetch the daily papers.I get payed 50p per week to do this.I have breakfast around 08.20 I usually have toast.Then I go and clean my teeth and depart for school the school day consists of one lesson in the morning before 10.30 usually Maths one lesson before 12.00,school dinners are available but most people have sandwiches.Then there are two lessons till the end of school.I go home and get changed into rough clothes.My bedtime is 21.00.
